title: [H-07] `SpinLottery` will break if the first `prizeId` is selected
summary: This bug report discusses an issue with a function called `_claimPrize` that is used to select a prize for a user. The problem occurs when a certain condition is met, causing the function to break and making it impossible for users to claim a specific prize. This happens because of a line of code that increments one variable and decrements another, resulting in the loss of a prize. The report recommends removing the line of code causing the issue to fix the problem.
